string.value: #p1013101# seems worried that the number of #o9300385#es has grown. Talk to #p1013101#.

#p1013101# says that he is worried whether the number of foxes in the #b#m100030300##k has also grown. He asks that you go to #bDad#k and ask him about the situation. If the number of foxes has grown, some major hunting may be required...
Dad seems to be more worried about the #o1210100#s than the #o9300385#es.
If the number of foxes has increased near the farm just like it has near our house, that'll interfere with Dad's farm work. We should investigate this. Don't you agree?
Go to the #b#m100030300##k and ask #bDad#k about the situation. If the number of #o9300385#es haa increased there as well, we're going to have to conduct a major #o9300385# hunt.
What? Think hard about this! If the farm fails, what are we going to survive on! Huh? Talk to me again and press ACCEPT this time!
What is it, Evan? I'm sure you're not here to deliver another #t4032448#, and I'm too busy to play with you... What? Have the number of foxes increased here?
Well, I'm not sure. I've been too busy to notice. The #b#o1210100##ks have been acting crazy, jumping all over the place. Even the foxes seem to be running away from the #o1210100#s...
Ah, maybe that is why the #o9300385# population near the house has increased. They ran there to escape from the #o1210100#s. Hmm...
You haven't talked to Dad yet? You didn't forget where he is, right? #bDad#k is at the #b#m100030300##k. Come on! Get your act together!
